author: Xbox
description:
The highly acclaimed ARPG Black Myth: Wukong launches on Xbox Series X|S on Aug. 20, 2025.

Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

* The trailer showcased PC-captured footage, including actual gameplay and in-game cinematics.

PRE-ORDER NOW: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/productid/9p2691n36rhp

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

title: Black Myth: Wukong - Coming to Xbox | Pre-order Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Architect Life: A House Design Simulator is available now!

The wait is over! It’s time to design, build, and bring your dream homes to life.
You’re the architect: balancing creativity, client needs, and functional design. From cozy bedrooms to open-concept masterpieces, Architect Life: A House Design Simulator puts the blueprint in your hands. Play now on Xbox Series X|S.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/architect-life-deluxe-home-edition/9NKGKJSN96V1/0010

author: Xbox
description:
Get the Lost Colony Expansion Pass and unlock early access to powerful bonuses that will shape your journey into ARK’s darkest chapter yet.

Discover the frost-covered ruins of Arat Prime—the birthplace of the ARKs—in ASA’s first major story expansion. Follow Mei Yin, voiced by Michelle Yeoh, in cinematic anime sequences created by legendary studio MAPPA, and prepare to face what was left behind.

Enhance your journey from day-one with the Lost Colony Expansion Pass! Immediately gain access to these exclusive bonuses:

- Fantastic Tames: Drakelings – Adorable seasonal shoulder dragons that each offer unique passive buffs, controlled descents, and can be wielded for tactical breath attacks and ally support. Collect all four to unlock their full potential.
- Veilwyn Companion – A mystical creature with aura-based buffs for defense, offense, and speed. It will evolve into one of two powerful forms at full launch.
- Lost Skill Tree System – Gain early access to a new progression system wi
title: ARK: Lost Colony Expansion Pass Trailer
